author: Robert Greenberg, VP/GM
title: Robert Greenberg, VP/GM
text: I wanted to take a moment to express my sincere thank you to Leah Rutledge whose patience and exceptional customer service helped us through a particularly sticky situation. Her attitude, behavior and technique coupled with her communication skills made what seemed a tricky situation become a non-event. Very professional.
